event.descr:
The OpenSSH sshd daemon refused to perform an authentication. It may happens, for example, when the OpenSSH server uses public key based authentication, and the authorized_keys file does not have the proper permissions and ownership.
Reason: %parm[errorMessage]%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg: OpenSSH server on node %nodelabel% refused to perform some authentication
